attributes.action: The electorate has no confidence in HM Government due to the crisis in our NHS
attributes.additional_details: the Red Cross categorising the NHS in crisis and the increases in waiting times at A&E. Also the 15hour shifts NHS staff are working due to staff shortages
attributes.background: I am proud of our National Health Service NHS and have seen all the excellent work our Nurses and Doctors do every day. I will not stand by and let this government destroy it and then privatise it so share holders can profit out of sick people. keep the NHS alive and increase funding of social care.

rejection.details: It is clear are concerned about the NHS, but it isn't clear what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. You could start a new petition asking the Government to increase funding for social care.
